item.description:
Here's a path that we haven't tried - The Washington Secondary.

This is a social bike ride - NOT a fast ride. We usually go at a 10 mph pace. Maybe we'll push it and go for 11 or 12 this time - certainly nothing that will get you winded or tired.

Basically it's just a social event that happens to take place on bikes.

We'll meet up at the Lowes parking lot and start biking. Can't find me? Make sure to take my cell # with you!

NOTE: Due to popular demand, many of us will be having lunch at Mr. Taco's Que Pasa Mexican restaurant at the end of the ride.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike - Try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: BIKING Washington Secondary Path ~25 miles
